column5: Mondays and Tuesdays are always tough for me. My shifts at the weather office run from 2pm Monday, 'till 6am Tuesday, then 2pm Tuesday 'till 6am Wednesday with basically no sleep from Sun night to Wed night.(my choice btw) Anyhow, as I sit here in my office with my last shift winding down trying to clear my head and pry my eyes open with nuclear strength java  , I'm filled with nervous anticipation. We leave later today at 1pm for our first film shoot in Algonquin Park. Hope things go well, there's a lot of people counting on me.  Report to follow next week  cheers,  Mike
Best of luck with the 1st episode Mike, I'm lookin forward  to hearing  how you make out

Good luck Mike, but don't get so stressed out about it that you don't have fun...it will show.  Get some sleep, relax, and have a blast and all will work out, look forward to reading about it when you return.  Maureen

Hey Mike....good luck with the filming....I'm sure you'll do fine!! Just go up there and do what you normally do....remember....just because your filming it....doesn't mean that you have to change things...be yourself and keep it natural and raw.  Pretend that the camera's are not even there.  Cheers  Jason
Have fun Mike and I'll be watching for the report when you return.
Thank's everyone for the support and advice. I've gotta quickly cut the grass, do some last minute shopping then I'm outta here! See y'all next week!
Good Luck Mike and I'm sure you and Dan will do just fine!  If this trip is like others that you have reported it will be great!  Relax, be yourself and have a great time.  Whopper

OH great....I get insanly jealous reading your reports and seeing your pictures.  Now I get to see full motion video and audio...great....LOL.  Seriously though, good luck up there...I'm really looking forward to seeing your adventures!
Best of luck!  Just do that voodoo that you do so well and it will turn out great!  dk
Hi Solopaddler. You may want to see if the fire restrictions are on for Algonquin. Just in case you may catch a fish and want to cook them up.
Good Luck looks like some nice weather. I know Doug is up there right now enjoying it.  I am jealous yes.....
good luck with the shoot looking forward to the report
Cant wait to read your great report and see the show!!! good luck up there
